document_data.name: Amarath
document_data.mainbody: '''Amarath''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Howling Hatred]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, Amarath and his fellow [[N'von]] led a contingent of cultists on [[giant vulture]]s in search of a [[cloud giant]] willing to ally with their cult. By accident, they found the flying [[Tower of Zephyros]] and went to speak with the giant, [[Zephyros]].
document_data.Propriety: Amarath possessed a ''[[bag of holding]]'' with an [[invisible stalker]] inside.
